introduction: Established in 2003 and chartered by the Government of Punjab in 2005, Beaconhouse National University (BNU) is Pakistan's pioneering not-for-profit liberal arts institution. Rooted in values of diversity, inclusiveness, and academic freedom, BNU offers a comprehensive education spanning conventional and emerging disciplines. Its commitment to need-based scholarships has provided over one billion rupees in financial assistance, ensuring accessibility for all eligible students.
